recipes.name: Coconut Lentil Curry
recipes.description: This 30-minute coconut lentil curry is one of our most popular lentil recipes to date. It's a fast and easy dinner idea that's healthy and full of flavor.

recipes.name: Masoor Dal
recipes.description: It's an authentic Indian lentil recipe from Chef Asma Khan, the force behind the all-women staffed London restaurant Darjeeling Express.
